Articles.Content:
Due to the fact that some of the Kerbal News Centers described JKSP as a "Danger to the whole Kerbol-System" and "Fuel/Kerbal Killing Terrorists", we decided to pick up some new technology for getting resources from other planets. Next to the Kethane Technology we decided to include decouplers and parachutes with every manned command pod to keep our reliable space pilots alive.

Recently we send pictures of our latest "Kethane Process Unit MK1" to the KNC in hope to restore faith for JKSP on Kerbin.
Good luck! Dumb media never understands space travel...
Just pay them to keep silent...
Launch something over their buildings. Something is bound to fall off and blow them up
